in Roman mythology (= ancient stories), the goddess (= female god) of war: He said that he was given his victory by Bellona, the goddess of war.
More examplesFewer examplesBellona is depicted wearing a military helmet and holding a sword, spear, or shield. Bellona's temple stood in the Campus Martius outside the gates of Rome.Bellona is described as the companion, sister, or wife of Mars.Bellona is often identified with the Greek war goddess, Enyo.
